Package com.myronmarston.util

Interface Summary
FileHelper.BufferedWriterUser Interface for using a buffered writer.
FileHelper.TempFileUser Interface for using a temporary file.
FileHelper.TransientFileUser Interface used by method deleteNewTransientFiles.
Publisher Interface for my own version of the Observer pattern, that overcomes some of the deficiencies of the Java librar implementation.
Subscriber Subscriber interface for my implementation of the Observer pattern, that overcomes some deficiencies in the Java library implementation.
 

Class Summary
AbstractPublisher My own implementation of the Observer pattern, that overcomes some of the deficiencies of the Java library implementation.
ClassHelper  
FileHelper A class that provides static methods to manage temporary file resources.
Fraction An immutable class representing fractions as pairs of longs.
MathHelper A class containing static helper methods for some math functions used to generate fractal music.
ProcessRunner A class that manages the running of a process.
ThreadedInputStreamRedirector A class that redirects an input stream to the System.out stream.
